question:
Fill in the Blank:

Heavy taxes were ________ the poor.
solution:
impose on

‘Impose on’ means to force something on someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी पर कोई चीज़ ज़बरदस्ती थोपना

Complete Sentence:

Heavy taxes were imposed on the poor.

गरीबों पर भारी कर थोपे गए।

Extra Example:

The new rules were imposed on students.

नए नियम छात्रों पर थोपे गए।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I was really ________ her performance.
solution:
impressed by

'Impressed by' is the standard phrase.

Hindi Meaning: प्रशंसा महसूस करना

Complete Sentence:

I was really impressed by her performance.

मैं उसकी प्रस्तुति से सच में प्रभावित था।

Extra Example:

I am impressed by your dedication.

मैं तुम्हारी निष्ठा से प्रभावित हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We were all ________ her performance.
solution:
impressed with

'Impressed with' means positively affected by.

Hindi Meaning: किसी वस्तु या व्यक्ति की प्रशंसा करना

Complete Sentence:

We were all impressed with her performance.

हम सभी उसके प्रदर्शन से प्रभावित हुए।

Extra Example:

I am impressed with your performance.

मैं तुम्हारे प्रदर्शन से प्रभावित हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He made a good ________ the interviewer.
solution:
impression on

'Impression on' means influence on someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के मन पर प्रभाव

Complete Sentence:

He made a good impression on the interviewer.

उसने साक्षात्कारकर्ता पर अच्छा प्रभाव डाला।

Extra Example:

He made a good impression on the boss.

उसने बॉस पर अच्छा प्रभाव डाला।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ accept new ideas.
solution:
inclined to

'Inclined to' means having a tendency.

Hindi Meaning: प्रवृत्ति होना

Complete Sentence:

She is inclined to accept new ideas.

वह नए विचारों को स्वीकारने के लिए प्रवृत्त है।

Extra Example:

He is inclined to argue.

वह बहस करने की प्रवृत्ति रखता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There was a sudden ________ prices.
solution:
increase in

'Increase in' refers to rise in amount or number.

Hindi Meaning: बढ़ती मात्रा

Complete Sentence:

There was a sudden increase in prices.

कीमतों में अचानक वृद्धि हुई।

Extra Example:

There is an increase in temperature.

तापमान में वृद्धि हो रही है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I am deeply ________ my parents.
solution:
indebted to

'Indebted to' means feeling grateful or obligated.

Hindi Meaning: धन्यवाद देना

Complete Sentence:

I am deeply indebted to my parents.

मैं अपने माता-पिता का अत्यंत ऋणी हूँ।

Extra Example:

I am indebted to my mentors.

मैं अपने मार्गदर्शकों का ऋणी हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ other people’s problems.
solution:
indifferent to

‘Indifferent to’ means having no interest.

Hindi Meaning: देखभाल नहीं कर रहा

Complete Sentence:

He is indifferent to others’ problems.

वह दूसरों की समस्याओं के प्रति उदासीन है।

Extra Example:

He is indifferent to praise or blame.

वह प्रशंसा या निंदा से बेपरवाह है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Her speech had a great ________ the audience.
solution:
influence on

'Influence on' means the effect on someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति/वस्तु पर प्रभाव

Complete Sentence:

Her speech had a great influence on the audience.

उसके भाषण का दर्शकों पर बड़ा प्रभाव पड़ा।

Extra Example:

Parents have influence on children.

माता-पिता का बच्चों पर प्रभाव होता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We need more ________ this topic.
solution:
information about

'Information about' is standard usage.

Hindi Meaning: संबंधित विवरण

Complete Sentence:

We need more information about this topic.

हमें इस विषय के बारे में और जानकारी चाहिए।

Extra Example:

I need information about the course.

मुझे कोर्स के बारे में जानकारी चाहिए।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The child is ________ what really happened.
solution:
innocent about

'Innocent about' means unaware.

Hindi Meaning: जागरूक या दोषी नहीं

Complete Sentence:

The child is innocent about what happened.

बच्चा जो हुआ उसके बारे में अनजान है।

Extra Example:

She is innocent about the issue.

वह उस मुद्दे के बारे में मासूम है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The boy was found ________ the charges.
solution:
innocent of

'Innocent of' means not guilty of.

Hindi Meaning: दोषी नहीं हूँ

Complete Sentence:

The boy was found innocent of the charges.

लड़का आरोपों में निर्दोष पाया गया।

Extra Example:

He is innocent of the charge.

वह आरोप से निर्दोष है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The CBI ordered an ________ the scam.
solution:
inquiry into

'Inquiry into' refers to investigation.

Hindi Meaning: जाँच पड़ताल

Complete Sentence:

The CBI ordered an inquiry into the scam.

सीबीआई ने घोटाले की जांच के आदेश दिए।

Extra Example:

There was an inquiry into the fraud.

धोखाधड़ी की जांच की गई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They ________ staying another day.
solution:
insist on

‘Insist on’ means to strongly demand or emphasize.

Hindi Meaning: किसी बात की दृढ़तापूर्वक मांग करना

Complete Sentence:

They insisted on staying another day.

उन्होंने एक दिन और रुकने पर ज़ोर दिया।

Extra Example:

He insisted on paying the bill.

उसने बिल चुकाने पर ज़ोर दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Children must learn to ________ their classmates.
solution:
interact with

‘Interact with’ means to communicate or engage.

Hindi Meaning: दूसरों के साथ संवाद करने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

Children must learn to interact with their classmates.

बच्चों को अपने सहपाठियों के साथ मिलजुलकर रहना सीखना चाहिए।

Extra Example:

He interacts well with children.

वह बच्चों के साथ अच्छी तरह घुलमिल जाता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He has a deep ________ politics.
solution:
interest in

'Interest in' is used to show curiosity.

Hindi Meaning: जिज्ञासा या चिंता

Complete Sentence:

He has a deep interest in politics.

उसे राजनीति में गहरी रुचि है।

Extra Example:

She has interest in painting.

उसे पेंटिंग में रुचि है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He earns high ________ his savings.
solution:
interest on

'Interest on' refers to financial return.

Hindi Meaning: निवेश से अर्जित धन

Complete Sentence:

He earns high interest on his savings.

वह अपनी बचत पर अधिक ब्याज कमाता है।

Extra Example:

You get interest on your savings.

आपकी बचत पर ब्याज मिलता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Are you ________ joining the club?
solution:
interested in

‘Interested in’ means showing curiosity or desire.

Hindi Meaning: अधिक जानना या शामिल होना चाहते हैं

Complete Sentence:

Are you interested in joining?

क्या आप क्लब में शामिल होने में रुचि रखते हैं?

Extra Example:

They are interested in sports.

वे खेलों में रुचि रखते हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I’m ________ know more about your work.
solution:
interested to know

'Interested to know' is a correct verbal phrase.

Hindi Meaning: जानने के लिए उत्सुक

Complete Sentence:

I’m interested to know more about your work.

मैं आपके काम के बारे में अधिक जानने में रुचि रखता हूँ।

Extra Example:

I am interested to know the details.

मैं विवरण जानने में रुचि रखता हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Don’t ________ matters that don’t concern you.
solution:
interfere in

‘Interfere in’ means to meddle or get involved unnecessarily.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ में अनावश्यक रूप से शामिल होना

Complete Sentence:

Don’t interfere in matters that don’t concern you.

जो बात आपसे संबंधित नहीं है उनमें हस्तक्षेप न करें।

Extra Example:

Don't interfere in my personal matters.

मेरे निजी मामलों में दखल न दो।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Don’t ________ her personal matters.
solution:
interfere with

‘Interfere with’ means to get involved in something that’s not your concern.

Hindi Meaning: किसी स्थिति में शामिल होकर व्यवधान उत्पन्न करना

Complete Sentence:

Don’t interfere with her personal matters.

उसकी निजी बातों में हस्तक्षेप मत करो।

Extra Example:

Don't interfere with my work.

मेरे काम में दखल मत दो।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The referee had to ________ the players during the match.
solution:
intervene between

‘Intervene between’ is used when coming between two sides.

Hindi Meaning: दो लोगों या समूहों के बीच हस्तक्षेप करना

Complete Sentence:

The referee had to intervene between the players during the match.

रेफरी को मैच के दौरान खिलाड़ियों के बीच हस्तक्षेप करना पड़ा।

Extra Example:

The teacher had to intervene between the two arguing students.

शिक्षक को झगड़ते दो छात्रों के बीच हस्तक्षेप करना पड़ा।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The teacher had to ________ the noisy class.
solution:
intervene in

‘Intervene in’ means to step in to alter a situation.

Hindi Meaning: परिणाम को रोकने या बदलने के लिए बीच में आना

Complete Sentence:

The teacher had to intervene in the noisy class.

शिक्षक को शोरगुल वाली कक्षा में हस्तक्षेप करना पड़ा।

Extra Example:

The UN intervened in the conflict.

संयुक्त राष्ट्र ने संघर्ष में हस्तक्षेप किया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He gave a brief ________ the guest.
solution:
introduction to

'Introduction to' is used for presenting someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति/वस्तु का प्रस्तुतीकरण

Complete Sentence:

He gave a brief introduction to the guest.

उसने अतिथि का संक्षिप्त परिचय दिया।

Extra Example:

Let me give you an introduction to the topic.

आइए मैं आपको विषय का परिचय दूं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

It’s wise to ________ your education.
solution:
invest in

‘Invest in’ means to spend time or money for future gain.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ में पैसा या प्रयास लगाना

Complete Sentence:

It’s wise to invest in your education.

अपनी शिक्षा में निवेश करना समझदारी है।

Extra Example:

She invested in real estate.

उसने अचल संपत्ति में निवेश किया।
